title: New Customer Acquisition - Mobile Plan
description: A potential new customer wants to sign up for a mobile plan.

tasks.description: Check service coverage at the customer's primary address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms strong 5G coverage at the provided address.

tasks.description: Ask qualifying questions about data usage and budget to recommend a suitable plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers customer needs and recommends the 'Unlimited Plus' plan.

tasks.description: Create a new customer account and process the order for the new plan and SIM card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the account and places the order.
